name: batcher
description: Batch image processing plugin for resizing, conversion, and export tasks.

name: beautify
description: Photo retouching plugin offering beautification and portrait enhancement filters.

name: bsz-gimp-plugins
description: Collection of small utilities and workflow enhancements.

name: Gimp_Layer_Effects_Text_Styler_Plugin_GEGL_Effects
description: A plugin that provides GEGL-based layer effects for styling, creative filters, and non-destructive editing.

name: gimp_upscale
description: AI upscaler using RealESRGAN; enhances resolution and image quality.

name: gimp-comfy-tools
description: Connects GIMP with ComfyUI for AI image generation and post-processing.

name: gimp-elsamuko
description: Creative preset pack with color adjustments, film looks, and vintage filters.

name: gimp-lqr-plugin
description: Content-aware image resizing, similar to Photoshop’s “Content-Aware Scale.”

name: GIMP-ML
description: Python-based ML toolkit with models for style transfer, super-resolution, and background removal.

name: gimp-plugin-bimp
description: Batch-process multiple images: resize, rotate, crop, watermark, and more.

name: gimp-plugins
description: A collection of GIMP plugins.

name: gimp-plugins
description: A collection of GIMP plugins.

name: gimp-plugins-collection
description: A collection of GIMP plugins.

name: gimp-rembg-plugin
description: Integrates [rembg](https://github.com/danielgatis/rembg) AI background removal with mask and crop options.

name: gimp3-rembg-plugin
description: GIMP 3.x UI variant of rembg plugin with live mask preview and batch support.

name: gimpsegany
description: Integrates Meta’s Segment Anything for advanced object isolation and smart masking.

name: nikgimp
description: A Python GIMP plugin for processing images using external Nik Collection programs.

name: openvino-ai-plugins-gimp
description: Adds Intel OpenVINO™-based AI features like enhancement, denoising, and segmentation.

name: RemoveBG-GIMP
description: Simple AI background remover using the [remove.bg](https://www.remove.bg/) API.

name: resynthesizer
description: Texture synthesis tool enabling “Content-Aware Fill”-like functionality.

name: Tritonhawk-Plus
description: Plugin designed for high-precision scientific or mathematical image analysis.
